name: Flesh Fest
description:
Now Hiring..! You.
Kidnapped by cultists. You are forced to work as a butcher, serving severed body parts to your new overlords. Guided by your menacing boss Suggz; chop, grind and package flesh in this VR Butcher experience.

Features
- Single Player, Virtual Reality Butcher experience
- A plethora of interactable objects
- Stylized Horror aesthetic
- Serveable, loveable and interesting customers.

Developed by Boy ScoutZ
Ethan Uy
Wilbur Arnott
Cory Marsh-Nichols
Joshua Tane
Ethan Buot
Darren Contreras
Johann Fajardo
